casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joe D. BARFIELD. No. 225P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of April 2006 by Defendant for Review of Motion for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
